Travel to Vietnam for Tourism & Business purposes – Fill Online Form & Enjoy Vietnam

Vietnam has fully reopened for international tourism without Covid-19 restrictions (No vaccination certificate, No test requirements, No quarantine, No medical declaration) and restored as usual as before Covid-19.

  • Easy 3-Step Process, reviewed  Expert Consultation
  • Support 24/7 for urgent request in holiday, weekends

item.title: Tet holiday in Vietnam: offering food and ghost money
item.dc:creator: caotrang
item.description: Unlike the West, Asians specially value worshipping ancestors, therefore, there are so many customs and rules in worshipping of Vietnamese people. Today we will see the 2 major items in the worshipping custom of Vietnamese people in Tet holiday. Tet is the most important event of a lunar year, on this occasion, people reunite and […]
item.content:encoded:
Unlike the West, Asians specially value worshipping ancestors, therefore, there are so many customs and rules in worshipping of Vietnamese people. Today we will see the 2 major items in the worshipping custom of Vietnamese people in Tet holiday.

Tet is the most important event of a lunar year, on this occasion, people reunite and have lots of parties, so of course, tributes for ancestors cannot be lacked on those days. In Tet, people usually offer food 3 times a day to their ancestors as if they were alive and needed 3 meals a day as they do. However, the custom nowadays has been simplified a lot. Today in Tet they burn incense sticks all days on the altar but fresh food is only served once a day.
